name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of extensive experience in developing high-availability applications, utilizing a robust tech stack including **Kubernetes**, **OpenShift**, **Docker**, **Linux**, **Cloud-native** technologies, **Golang**, **Python**, and **Java**. Proven expertise in automation and NFV, with a solid foundation in hybrid cloud environments. Highly skilled in building and deploying cloud-native systems, effectively implementing microservices, and streamlining CI/CD pipelines.

Demonstrated history of delivering AI/ML-powered platforms that drive predictive analytics and automation solutions. Possesses hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development practices, ensuring alignment with regulatory standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps, with expertise in model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
